document_data.name: Murtil Dragonsbane
document_data.mainbody: 'Murtil Dragonsbane''' was the King of [[Bloodstone Lands|Bloodstone]] in the mid-to-late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], and the last of the [[Dragonsbane]] dynasty.{{Cite digital book/Hero/Kindle||2}}
document_data.History:
He likely ruled from the assassination of [[Brianne Dragonsbane]] in the {{YearlinkName|1459}}{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|78}} until the {{YearlinkName|1465}},Murtil is stated to have died 22 years prior to the events of ''[[Hero]]'', which is understood to take place in [[1487 DR]]. when he died as a childless bachelor. and indeed Murtil had been killed by Yarin's favorite hitman, [[Rafer Ingot]].{{Cite digital book/Hero/Kindle||10}}

Murtil's reign saw the beginning of the end of the unified [[Kingdom of Bloodstone]] when the [[Warlock Knights]] of [[Vaasa]] rebelled in the {{YearlinkName|1460}}.
